info.author: Holger Peters
info.description:
Typecase
========

A library providing `Algebraic Data Types
<https://en.wikipedia.com/wiki/Algebraic_data_type>`_ for Python.


This library is in a very early development stage (pre-alpha) and **thus not
recommended  - yet - for public use.**

Development
-----------

The easiest way to run the tests is with tox, for this install::

    pip install tox tox-pyenv

You can omit "tox-pyenv" if you are not using pyenv for installing your Python
distribution.

Tests are executed via::

    tox
info.name: typecase
info.summary: Library providing algebraic datatypes for Python

A library providing Algebraic Data Types for Python.

This library is in a very early development stage (pre-alpha) and thus not recommended - yet - for public use.

Development

The easiest way to run the tests is with tox, for this install:

You can omit “tox-pyenv” if you are not using pyenv for installing your Python distribution.
